title: Message non-friends?
body: Hi guys, I was wondering if there was anyway to message people on league that aren't on your friend list. Thanks for any help. Bye. <3

replies.body: Private messaging other players is not possible unless you are on their friend's list.  You can still communicate with players through public venues including in-game, club rooms, or public rooms.
Unless they're in the club you're in, nope.
